title: My team is using single sign-on, and I can’t log in
content:
If your organization uses SAML single sign-on for authentication to third-party applications and services, please sign in to Grammarly through your identity provider, such as Okta, Microsoft Entra ID, Google, or another.
If you do not see Grammarly listed among the available applications in your identity provider, we recommend contacting your organization’s IT support to request access to Grammarly.
